TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASZAPLINK_CONNECTOR's exception class. Exception class dedicated to error handling of exception in connectors (ZAPLINK_CONNECTOR & inheriting classes & ZAPLINK_CONNECTORS). Have a look to each Exception text for more details. U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application
